entries: The skeleton lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The skeleton lord's weapon attacks are magical and have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton lord makes three greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Skeleton Warrior
languages: all the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The skeleton warrior has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The skeleton warrior's weapon attacks are magical and have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton warrior makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ssendam's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). Ssendam can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Madness
entries: Any creature (other than undead or constructs) that ends its turn within 10 feet of Ssendam must make a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be inflicted with a random short-term madness. If a creature succeeds against any madness ability of Ssendam's, they are immune to Ssendam's madness for 1 hour.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Ssendam fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ssendam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Ssendam's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration (Golden Amoeba Form Only)
entries: Ssendam regains 40 hit points at the start of her turn if she has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Ssendam can use her action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Small aberration that looks like a golden amoeba, or back into this, her golden slaad form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Her statistics in the humanoid forms, other than her size, are the same.

While in her amoeba form, Ssendam has the same statistics with the following changes. She can't take any actions (except her Shapechanger action), speak, or manipulate objects. She has a movement speed of 40 feet and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, Ssendam can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. She has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws, and has resistance to all damage except psychic and radiant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ssendam makes three attacks: one with her Touch of Madness and two with her chaos staff.

action.name: Chaos Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage. The target must also make a {@dc 19} Constitution or be {@condition stunned}. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns.

action.name: Summon Slaadi (1/Day)
entries: Ssendam summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@creature death slaad||death slaadi}. A summoned slaad appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Ssendam, acts as an ally of Ssendam, and can't summon other slaadi. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Ssendam dies, or until Ssendam dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Ssendam magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

action.name: Touch of Madness
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage. A target that fails a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw is inflicted with a random short-term madness. If it is already mad, the existing madness is replaced with a random long-term madness.

reaction.name: Amoeba
entries: When damaged, Ssendam can use her reaction to shapechange into her golden amoeba form and the damage is reduced to 0.

legendary.name: Chaos Staff
entries: Ssendam makes one attack with her chaos staff.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Ssendam uses her Teleport action.

legendary.name: Subversion (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Ssendam forces every creature suffering from madness within 60 feet of her to use their reaction to attack another creature within 5 feet of them.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Suldil Baldoriel is an 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Suldil can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Mounted
entries: If Suldil isn't mounted, she can use a bonus mount, provided Suldil and the young bronze dragon are on the same plane of existence. When she teleports, Suldil appears astride the young bronze dragon along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not {@condition incapacitated}, Suldil can't be surprised, and both her and her mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Young Bronze Dragon
entries: Suldil is accompanied by a young bronze dragon. The dragon allows Suldil to use him as a mount.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The sword spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the sword spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The sword spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sword spider makes two foreleg attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Foreleg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Javelin Expert
entries: Tasloi can use their Dexterity score for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

action.name: Javelin

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. {@h}5 (1 + 4) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for one hour.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Touch of Sune
entries: Tiberius Inuus touches a creature. The target magically regains 40 Hit Points and is freed from any disease or poison.

reaction.name: Vengeance
entries: When Tiberius Inuus is hit by an attack he can utter an oath of vengeance against the creature that made the attack. He gains advantage on attack rolls against that creature for 1 minute or until it drops to 0 hit points or falls {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Mage Slaying
entries: When Valygar deals damage to a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Disrupt Spell
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of Valygar casts a spell, he can use his reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

trait.name: Animal Companions
entries: Vellin is accompanied by a {@creature wolf} with maximum hit points (18) named Akela. Vellin can mount or dismount Akela using 5 ft. of movement. While mounted, Vellin can order Akela to Dash, Disengage, and Dodge. In addition, Vellin has an {@creature owl} companion with maximum hit points (3). On Vellin's turn, the owl can perform a flyby on a creature of Vellin's choice. The next attack that Vellin makes against that creature has advantage.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Vellin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Vellin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Fiend Slayer
entries: When Vellin hits a Fiend with a weapon attack he deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Vellin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vellin makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Viconia is a 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Viconia has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Viconia wears a belt of fire giant strength and a cloak of protection and wields a mace +3. Without the belt, her strength is 12 and her speed is reduced to 20 ft.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Viconia has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Viconia to sleep.

trait.name: Living Shadow
entries: While in dim light or darkness, Viconia has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Viconia has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Viconia attacks with her Mace +3 and casts a spell.

action.name: Mace, +3
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Viktor is a 16th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Viktor has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Brave
entries: Viktor has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Shadow Dragon Companion
entries: Viktor has a young gold shadow dragon that accompanies him at all times. If Viktor dies, the young gold shadow dragon returns to the Shadowfell.

trait.name: Sun Blade
entries: Viktor wields a Sun Blade. Viktor gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage (this is already factored into Viktor's stat block). When Viktor hits an undead with this sword, that target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage. The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Viktor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Sun Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) radiant damage or 11 ({@dice 1d10 + 6}) radiant damage if used with two hands. An additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage is dealt if the target is undead.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The wolfwere can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a human or elf, or back into its true form, which is a dire wolf. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolfwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolfwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolfwere's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack (Hybrid form only)
entries: The wolfwere makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Longsword (Humanoid form only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid form only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claws (Hybrid form only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lethargic Song (Humanoid form only)
entries: The wolfwere plays a magical melody on an instrument. Every humanoid within 200 ft. of the wolfwere that can hear the melody must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@spell slow||slowed} for 10 minutes. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this wolfwere's melody for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xan is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Xan has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Xan wields a Moonblade. The Moonblade has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (already factored into Xan's attacks) and has the finesse property.

trait.name: Bladesong
entries: Xan can use a bonus action to start a bladesong. His bladesong lasts for 1 minute. While using bladesong his movement increases to 40 ft., he gains a +3 bonus to his AC and he gains a +3 bonus to all concentration checks.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Xan has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Xan to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xan makes two attacks with his Moonblade.

action.name: Moonblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage or 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xzar is an 16th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). Xzar has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: No Soul
entries: Since Xzar doesn't have a soul, resurrection magic is able to work upon him no matter how much time has passed. For example, a revivify would work on Xzar a week after he died. The only drawback is that True Resurrection and Wish are unable to bring Xzar back to life if no body exists.

trait.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
entries: When Xzar kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, Xzar regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

trait.name: Chaos Phage
entries: Xzar's infusion with the Chaos Phage gives him the following benefits:

items: Xzar regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point
Xzar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Xzar has resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder
Xzar has darkvision and telepathy to 60 ft.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.
